attributes.action: reduce the vat level to zero for all sporting activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government keeps on telling us we are fast becoming a unhealthy, obese nation yet still has the audacity to charge TAX on sporting activities.

17.5% TAX paid to go swimming in a local council run swimming pool. 

How dare you call us unhealthy & obese yet profit when we try to take exercise.

0% TAX/VAT on all sporting activities ASAP.
